name: Evan Hsu
subtitle: Front-End Engineer | 3+ Years of Experience
about_me: A developer with a solid foundation in native JavaScript, now passionately focused on building modern web experiences with Vue and Nuxt. I thrive on solving complex problems and turning ambitious ideas into reality. My experience in maintaining large-scale applications has given me a keen eye for robust and scalable architecture.

interests.title: Interests
interests.content: Hiking, running, travel planning, and a good game of chess.

ideal: Open to new adventures—in technology and across the globe.

timelineItem.title: Frontend Developer
description: Responsible for maintaining and developing company frontend systems, optimizing with jQuery and native JavaScript (ES6+).

Independently developed a Nuxt 3 project, implementing multi-language support, content management (text editing, image creation/deletion), and database integration, providing colleagues with practical operation tools.
Collaborated on backend dashboard development, improving user experience and interface workflows.
Proactively proposed and drove frontend technology upgrades, demonstrating initiative in system optimization and forward-looking technical thinking.
Proficient in Vue.js; capable of maintaining existing jQuery-based projects while also applying Vue.js to new projects to enhance performance and maintainability.

timelineItem.title: Frontend Developer
description: Worked on a Vue 2 project using Element UI, responsible for maintaining existing features and developing new components based on evolving project needs.
Implemented dynamic forms, user interactions, and data rendering with attention to performance and user experience.
Collaborated closely with back-end developers to integrate APIs and ensure consistency between front-end behavior and server responses.
Took over and extended an existing codebase by reviewing previous developers’ work and communicating directly to clarify logic and architecture.

timelineItem.title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed responsive websites using WordPress and Elementor, translating Adobe XD designs into functional front-end layouts using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Worked alongside the project manager to clarify project requirements, discuss technical feasibility, and support communication between design and development.
Occasionally interacted directly with clients to gather feedback or clarify expectations, gaining exposure to client-facing project communication.
While back-end work was handled by senior engineers, I contributed to front-end implementation and CMS configuration across multiple WordPress-based projects.

timelineItem.title: Frontend Developer
description: Translated Adobe XD design mockups into responsive web pages using jQuery and Bootstrap 4.
Communicated directly with designers via Microsoft Teams to clarify UI/UX requirements and ensure pixel-perfect implementation.
Collaborated with full-stack developers to integrate front-end pages into a basic Laravel environment.
Managed code versioning and collaborated via Git and GitHub, following structured development workflows.
Gained hands-on experience working across teams in a fast-paced, project-based environment.
